column2: Update pact traits for all characters, immediately. (Normally happens yearly.)
This will take a few seconds.
This character is a close relative, so we can negotiate a non-aggression pact or alliance with them. We can also negotiate non-aggression pacts with their spouse and spouse's close relatives.
We have an alliance with this character.
We have a non-aggression pact with this character.
